title: White House to host Intel, Apple, Microsoft execs to discuss chip shortage
text:
Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo and  National Economic Council Director Brian Deese will lead the meeting, which was announced last week.

Intel's Pat Gelsinger plans to attend, according to Reuters; it's unclear if other CEOs will join him. Representatives from Samsung Electronics Co. KR:005930, General Motors Co. GM, Stellantis NV STLA, Micron Technology Inc. MU, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. TSM and BMW XE:BMW are also expected to attend, according to the report.

The meeting will reportedly focus on how to handle the ongoing semiconductor shortage, and how to ease the production bottlenecks.
